question: According to the sample registration system report 2019,which state has the highest Maternal Mortality Rate?
explanation: The maternal mortality rate has declined in India, as per sample registration system report. As per the report, MMR has been declined up to 26.9 per cent. While Assam had registered the highest maternal mortality rate, 229 and Kerala with 42 had registered the lowest maternal mortality rate.In southern states, MMR has come down from 77 to 72 per one lakh births, while in other states the figure has come down from 93 to 90. The report indicates that India has prevented about 2000 MMR per year.
